column3: Traffic;Preah Sihanouk: Four vehicles collided along National Highway 4 on the bridge in Kampong Seila at about 7 am on February 24
column4: 2019. Preliminary reports from the Royal Gendarmerie of Kompong Seila reported that there were no deaths
column5: but some injuries.------Traffic disruption on Highway 4 is likely until the scene can be cleared.
